details:
Importing the module overwrite the default requests methods and stdout objects. Later usage of overwritten methods will modify provided data by adding comments to Telegram messages. No known usage


---

Category: HIGHLY_SUSPICIOUS - Packages that are likely malicious, but due to the obfuscation level, lack of time or clear indicators it's hard to say what exactly they do; the highest risk of false positives.


Campaign: 2025-04-kql


Reasons (based on the campaign):


 - iritating-computer-activity
